questions.name: Arlo Rune
questions.quest: How many times do you fold biscuit dough before cutting it into shapes for baking?

questions.name: Karen Lynn
questions.quest: Why do I think my cat is so cute?

answers.author: Kyle Aaron
answers.ans: Ten times should do.  If you fold the dough more than that, there will not be enough air to make the biscuit flaky.
